text: Ware wa, jitsuni anata gata (kuraishu-zoku) ni mo ataenakatta chikara o, chokaku to shikaku to kokoro o kare-ra ni sazuketa. Soredemo kare-ra wa, arra no shirushi o mitomenakatta tame, sono chokaku to shikaku to kokoro wa, mattaku kare-ra o ekisuru koto naku, kare-ra wa jibun no chosho shite ita mono ni, torikakoma rete shimatta
